name: Dogs Day
description:
Dogs Day is an incredibly exciting game in which you have to solve simple puzzles with furry doggies.

A cute and incredibly exciting game with simple puzzles, relaxing music and a gentle atmosphere will help you relax after a hard day in the company of furry doggies.

Enjoy 9 levels, solve puzzles, each of which is unique and difficult in its own way, and the solution of which will give you an incredible experience and a new exhibit in your personal gallery.

The game contains materials that are not suitable for people of all ages and unacceptable for viewing at work: nudity, sexual materials for adults only.
